Package tool

Tool classes are used to defined the kind of surprise.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttackTool
    Class representing attack tool.
    Club
    Class representing club, only for Warrior.
    DefenseTool
    Class representing defense tool.
    Fireball
    Class representing fireball, only for Wizard.
    LargePotion
    Class representing large potion.
    Lightning
    Class representing lightning, only for Wizard.
    Spell
    Class representing spell, only for Wizard.
    StandardPotion
    Class representing default potion.
    Sword
    Class representing sword, only for Warrior.
    Weapon
    Class representing weapon, only for Warrior.

Package tool Description

Tool classes are used to defined the kind of surprise. These classes contain several informations depending on the kind of tool it is.
